message.content: Welcome to the PSG Community! How can I help you today?
I'm in Paris and would love to see a game!
Great, I'll check for available tickets and get back to you.

props.title: PSG vs Real Madrid Ticket
props.description: Experience the excitement of the upcoming PSG vs Real Madrid match! Premium seat in Parc des Princes stadium.

message.content: Okay, to reward users for joining your Discord server, let's set up a reward. What kind of reward would you like to offer?
Great! And how many $OPEN tokens should they receive for joining?
Does this summary look correct? (Type 'Yes' to confirm)
Excellent! Task creation complete. Your users can now earn rewards for joining your Discord server. What would you like to do next?

tasks: Create a community in community platform
